title: Deals: Lenovo Tab P12 Pro Android tablet $120 off, Moto G 5G hits $350, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by a new all-time low on Lenovo’s flagship Tab P12 Pro Android tablet at $120 off. That’s alongside the first price cut on the new Moto G 5G at $350 and the eufy smart pan and tilt cam for $39. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Lenovo Tab P12 Pro Android tablet $120 off, Moto G 5G hits $350, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Taking $120 off several configurations, the Lenovo Tab P12 Pro is down to new all-time lows starting at $580 alongside other discounts today.
